snippet: The legendary journalist and the Oscar-nominated actress opine on Saint Laurent roller skates, Sylvester Stallone as an artist, the rapper Iggy Azalea and more.
abstract: The legendary journalist and the Oscar-nominated actress opine on Saint Laurent roller skates, Sylvester Stallone as an artist, the rapper Iggy Azalea and more.

headline.main: A Dual Review of What's New, Starring Gay Talese and Juliette Lewis
